text_block_list.text: And now, the awaited day of the Individual Athletics Competition is here. The school grounds were full of people from inside the academy and outside—
Ah, there you are Acute!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: The race is finally here, I'm really looking forward to it! I'm not losing no ma～tter what, so I hope you're prepared☆.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: I don't plan on losing either～. I'll show everyone that I can to catch up to you.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Hey, you know who that girl is? The one talking to Falco right now.
text_block_list.name: Spectator A

text_block_list.text: I don't know… I wonder if Smart Falcon's wary of her. Could she be an unexpected competitor in this competition?
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text: The obscure Wonder Acute was beginning to draw attention after receiving a declaration of war from Smart Falcon, who was unrivaled on the dirt.
I hope she doesn't get swept up in this atmosphere. If her body stiffens, then her shoulders and legs' flexibility would contract and that would also affect her form.
choice_data_list: Should I check your muscle tension once more?

text_block_list.text: Oh my, is that okay? Thank you deary, go right ahead.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Wonder Acute wasn't showing any signs of tension, but when I felt her muscles, they were stiff as I expected. I started to massage her shoulder to loosen it up—
Oh my, is this a shoulder massage? Thank you deary, it's fine if it'll make me stronger. I need to get pumped up, so please don't hold back on the massage.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: It seems my weak strikes won't be able to loosen the tension of her mind or body. If that was the case, then I'll put all my strength into this massage!
Hyaa! This is it! Now my head's in the game, I'm off to take the gold!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: 10th Race, Dirt 2000m and with perfect weather conditions. Every Uma Musume has entered the gate— And they're off!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Smart Falcon with an excellent start as expected. She takes the lead like an arrow shot from a bow!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: She's a charming Uma Musume with a striking escape. Establishing a large lead, it's hard to catch back up at the end.
text_block_list.name: Commentary

text_block_list.text: Uuu～ra ra ra ra～!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Amazing! Of course the strongest on the dirt would be Falco! No one can catch up to that!
text_block_list.name: Spectator A

text_block_list.text: But… isn't there a girl that's barely managing to keep up? Look, that girl who looked gentle and soft earlier!
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (I won't lose… Keep my form… Right here, I have to…)
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Whoa, wait, isn't she being reckless right now!? Trying to run at the same pace as Falco before even debuting. She's only gonna get crushed.
text_block_list.name: Spectator A

text_block_list.text: But… her spirit is amazing… Being able to keep up with that speed in the first place…
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text: (I have to go for it… So I can deliver it to Trainer! Carefully, earnestly… I'll deliver a good result, right now…)
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: "Let's stretch your right foot a little longer."
(You don't treat every Umamusume the same. We faced this battle head on, together …)
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: "Your tenacity is your special weapon."
"Your tenacity is your special weapon."
(You even taught something I didn't know, my own strong point. Calling it a secret weapon, we grew together.)
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (You're really… an amazing person… and if you have never noticed, I'd be…)
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
… So you made it this far, Acute. 
You've done well to get here.
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Although, I still have a lot more… to give to my fans!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: And now they've rounded the final corner onto the final straight. Smart Falcon is making her move, what monstrous acceleration!!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Wonder Acute is having it tough here! The gap is slowly widening!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Daaaamn it, that's it. She held out as long as she could!
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text: This was obviously going to happen, her opponent was Smart Falcon! She hasn't even debuted yet! It's ridiculous that she even managed to keep up!
text_block_list.name: Spectator A

text_block_list.text: Everyone around me already believed that Smart Falcon was going to win. Of course they would. Wonder Acute still hadn't debuted and was a nameless Uma Musume to them.
But I knew something they didn't. Her tenacity. Pushing herself for the sake of others and becoming stronger. With that passion—
choice_data_list: Don't give up! Believe in your training!
Don't give up! Believe in your training!

text_block_list.text: Here, I go!!!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
I won't give up! I won't falter! Until the end… I'll! 
—Daaaaaaah!!!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Here she comes!! Wonder Acute is accelerating once more! Using all her strength, she's catching up to Smart Falcon!!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: This is… unbelieveable. Is this really the running of an uma musume who hasn't debuted yet?
text_block_list.name: Commentary

text_block_list.text: A miraculous approach, it's Wonder Acute! Can she surpass her? Can she surpass her!? Will it be Falcon, or will it be Acute!? The winner is—
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Smart Falcon!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: (Wooooooooooooo!!!)
And the Individual Athletics Competition has ended, in a narrow defeat—

I'm sorry about today. 
I couldn't win in the end.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: I wanted to beat Falco, and give you a large confidence boost…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: The tenacity she showed at the end was something we built together. Seeing that result, there was no way I'd think that I was "unfit to be a trainer".
choice_data_list: Also, I have a new goal.

text_block_list.text: It's regrettable that she lost to Smart Falcon by a margin at that time. But in the sea of voices and cheering, I heard a voice—

She lost… but, that was amazing… 
I ended up cheering for her…
text_block_list.name: Spectator B

text_block_list.text: Her running didn't falter and warmed the heart of someone in the crowd. If she knew that, then I think she would bravely run again.
After all, she was a girl that would push herself to the brink of breaking for the sake of others. She would need someone beside her so she doesn't end up breaking one day—
choice_data_list: Can I support you next time as well?
Can I support you next time as well?

text_block_list.text: Ooh… is that to say, you'll still be my trainer from now on?
choice_data_list: Of course, if it's okay with you!
Of course, if it's okay with you!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Oh deary, that should be something I'm saying. 
You're a real humble one, Trainer.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: If that's the case, then I'll be in your care tomorrow onwards. Don't you worry about a thing, these tough muscles of mine can take whatever training you throw at them.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Wonder Acute laughed jokingly. However, I already know that on the inside, she hides a fighting spirit unlike any other.
Something that could have only been achieved through steady effort. If it was Wonder Acute, I know one day she'll be able to achieve it.
